short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insert an 'Edit' button on your websites to redirect you quickly to the editing mode, even if not logged in anymore! No '/wp-admin'!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "ClickEdit Connect" extension simplifies the editing process for WordPress websites. With the touch of a button, the "Edit" button redirects you instantly to the last page visited, even if the session cookies have expired. This saves time and reduces navigation headaches, making it easier for busy staff to focus on important tasks. Additionally, the extension is secure as no sensitive information is stored, providing peace of mind for website owners. 


***Key Highlights:***

* Hassle-Free -  Easy Access without account creation
* Long-Term Memory - Robust Memory that lasts even after cookies clear
* Quick Redirection -  Swift Redirection with a single click
* Secure -  Safe with no storage of confidential information
* Flexible -  Allows users to choose their preferred password vault
* Non-Intrusive -  Lightweight and non-impacting on website performance
* Self Service - No need to create service tickets 

We greatly appreciate your review and feedback as it helps us improve our offerings and bring more value to you with innovative solutions to solve everyday problems. Thank you for using ClickEdit Connect!
